name: ProcrastiTyper
description:
You've forgotten to write your assigned essay...again! Quickly type out SOMETHING to hand the teacher before she collects them in 1 minute!

A simple concept for a typing game that I wanted to get out of my head and into something tangible. Quickly type out words relevant to the subject of your essay to increase your grade!

Only controls are using the keyboard to type and Escape to quit.

Credits:

@wyver9 for the music!
